snippet: United Parcel Service has appealed a decision by European antitrust authorities that blocked its proposed $6.7 billion takeover bid for the Dutch shipping company TNT Express.
abstract: United Parcel Service has appealed a decision by European antitrust authorities that blocked its proposed $6.7 billion takeover bid for the Dutch shipping company TNT Express.

headline.main: U.P.S. Appeals Decision Blocking TNT Express Takeover
